properties.headline: High Surf Warning issued February 14 at 6:00AM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description: Dangerously large breaking waves of 25 to 35 feet with occasional sets to 40 feet are expected. Very dangerous swimming and surfing conditions with life-threatening rip currents. Sneaker waves possible which can suddenly wash people into the frigid ocean.
properties.instruction: Everyone should remain out of the water due to life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off beaches and rocks. Coastal flooding possible. Do not venture onto jetties, piers, or other structures that are exposed to waves.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
